title: Unable to connect to the LOL client
body: As the title says I cant connect. Nothing is wrong with my Wifi and I can find anything saying something is wrong with the servers

replies.body:
If you're having an issue logging into the client, try [**swapping over to Google's DNS**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) and rebooting your PC to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this worked for you. ^.^
